© 2023 The University of Vermont Medical Center

The University of Vermont Medical Center serves all of Vermont and the northern New York region. Located in Burlington, The UVM Medical Center is a regional, academic healthcare center and teaching hospital in alliance with the University of Vermont.

The UVM Medical Center and the Larner College of Medicine at UVM together offer over 42 residency and fellowship programs in a university based, academically focused setting that provides well-rounded medical training experience.
